attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in UK Prime Minister Theresa May
attributes.additional_details:
By consorting with Donald Trump, Theresa May is acting as an ambassador for all British citizens, and by proxy, we are endorsing his behaviour and not condemning it. 

A vote of no confidence would bring about a general election, and we would have a PM that actually speaks for the majority of the UK, as opposed to an unelected "voice of the people".
attributes.background:
Theresa May, the unelected Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, is intent on a 'Special Relationship" with a facist, misogynistic President and has shown little regard for public opinion. 

We call for a vote of no confidence and a general election, to bring in an elected PM who speaks for us.
